summary.span: 表示所有 控制項的基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Represents the base class for all controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，以回應使用者按一下時。Handle the event to respond when the user clicks a . 使用者可以提高使用的事件或按 ENTER 或空格鍵，且焦點在控制項時。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 當使用者按下空格鍵，控制集中至`true`和捕捉到滑鼠。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 如此一來，控制項將會引發滑鼠事件這類和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 請注意，使用或 ENTER 不會變更或捕捉滑鼠，但卻事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 設定; 附加屬性`true`。The sets the attached property to `true`. 會將 屬性設定為 `false`。The sets the property to `false`. A是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板） 的單一物件。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 當按一下 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以提高使用的事件或按 ENTER 或空格鍵，且焦點在控制項時。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 當使用者按下空格鍵，控制集中至`true`和捕捉到滑鼠。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 如此一來，控制項將會引發滑鼠事件這類和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 請注意，使用或 ENTER 不會變更或捕捉滑鼠，但卻事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 標記事件處理方法並引發事件。The marks the event as handled in the method and raises the event. 因此，事件永遠不會繼承自控制項。Hence, the event will never occur for a control that inherits from . 相反地，附加事件處理常式事件或呼叫具有`handledEventsToo`設定為`true`。Instead, attach an event handler to the event, or call with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範三種不同的方式回應按選動作的三個按鈕。The following example shows three buttons that respond to clicks in three different ways. - 暫留時的第一個按鈕會變更色彩當滑鼠停留在按鈕上的使用者Hover - the first button changes colors when the user hovers with the mouse over the button - 按下-滑鼠被按下按鈕的滑鼠指標時需要第二個按鈕。Press - the second button requires that the mouse be pressed while the mouse pointer is in the button. - 版本-第三個滑鼠是按下並放開按鈕中之前，不會重設按鈕的背景色彩。Release - the third does not reset the background color of the buttons until the mouse is pressed and released in the button. [!code-xaml[ClickModes_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來建立命令與特定按鈕的執行個體關聯。This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，這個屬性通常會設定為靜態命令的值，其中一個現有的指令程式庫，這類或。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 命令概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)或。For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md) or . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *commandName**commandName* 要在按下此按鈕時叫用的命令。The command to invoke when this button is pressed. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定要傳遞至 屬性的參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the property.

value.span: 要傳遞至 屬性的參數。

span.span: Parameter to pass to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分現有的命令，從命令程式庫不會使用命令參數。Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter. 使用命令參數的命令，其中大部分會採用參數，使用一些基本的型別值，例如整數或字串。Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string. 不過，就可以建立自訂的命令，該命令必須要有非基本型別做為命令參數。However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter. 自訂命令這種情況下，設定如在程式碼可能需要將新的或現有的物件執行個體。For a custom command case like this, setting in code might require a new or existing object instance. 設定標記中可能需要屬性元素語法，其中填入屬性項目語法的物件項目是由該命令必須是類型的新項目。Setting in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command. 或者，在標記中的設定可能需要透過標記延伸的現有物件的參考 (通常這些參考做[Binding 標記延伸模組](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)或[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)).Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *commandParameter**commandParameter* 值，以做為特定的命令中指定相同型別的預期屬性。A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects. 如果您使用現有的指令程式庫命令時，請參閱該命令程式庫的文件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量資訊，包括哪一種命令必須要有。If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of the command expects. 如果您使用自訂的命令，請參閱 < 備註 >。If you use a custom command, see Remarks. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是按鈕，指出滑鼠左鍵的狀態，或移至按鈕按下空格鍵。 is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button. 當是`true`，控制項捕捉到滑鼠。When is `true`, the control captures the mouse. 如此一來，控制項將會引發滑鼠事件這類和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 請注意，使用或 ENTER 不會變更或捕捉滑鼠，但未引發事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but is does raise the event. 開始使用.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，受保護的 setter。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應為目標.NET Framework 3.5 版。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用中觸發程序的樣式屬性。This example shows how to use the property in a trigger style. summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，當這個控制項取得焦點時使用者按下按鍵便會發生。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定事件資料的屬性`true`時未設定為和下列案例之一成立：This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when is not set to and one of the following cases are true: - 使用者按下空格鍵。The user presses the SPACEBAR. - 使用者按下 ENTER 並是`true`這個控制項。The user presses ENTER and is `true` for this control. 在其他情況下，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定屬性的事件資料，以`true`當使用者放開空格鍵。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR. 否則，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
